situation: G experienced stress from unpredictable changes in class routines, affecting her ability to interact with peers during group projects.
action: The teacher aide maintained a predictable schedule for G and used a visual timetable to prepare her for any changes. They encouraged peer support by having a classmate help reinforce the planned routines.
effect: G managed changes more effectively, reducing her stress levels and allowing her to participate in group projects. The structured environment and social support improved G’s interaction capabilities and engagement with peers.
topic: Social Interaction Challenges - Difficulties with peer interactions, challanges during
